title: Apple and pomegranate crumble
ingredients: ['4 medium apples, peeled, cored and sliced', '1/2 pomegranate, skin and light-coloured membrane removed', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '40g porridge oats', '60g plain flour', '100g caster sugar', '115g unsalted butter, melted']
